parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "Slurm",
"software": [
"python",
"mldock_gnn.py",
"Horovod",
"CUDA",
"MPI"
],
"resources": [
"Cray XC50",
"V100 GPUs",
"lus/scratch/jbalma",
"lus/scratch/avose"
],
"libraries": [
"TensorFlow"
],
"other": "The script uses SLURM job scheduler to run a distributed training and inference workflow with Horovod on Cray XC50 with V100 GPUs. It uses a Python script named 'mldock_gnn.py' for training and inference. The script utilizes CUDA for GPU acceleration and MPI for communication between processes. The script uses a number of environment variables, including SCRATCH, CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES, and HOROVOD related variables to configure the environment and optimize the performance of the code."
}
```
